Title: Our Gang
Plot: Internal Affairs investigates the shooting death of Det. Crowley, but Aceveda speaks starts his own investigation. Meanwhile, Claudette and Dutch investigate the shooting of a churro vendor that ends up in the Strike Team busting up a gang initiation
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Reed Diamond, John Diehl, Guy Torry, Frank Grillo, April Grace, Iona Morris
